content.raw:
Hi @danr11, it becomes complicated for us to review the code in pieces. Ideally, you should organize your model so it is fully functional on one branch.

You can do it like this:

    cd <path to>/gazebo_models
    # move to the branch on your repository for this pull request
    hg up default
    # merge pull request #209 into this one
    hg merge danr11/added-summit_xl-to-cmakelist-1468230656831
    hg commit -m "Merging branch danr11/added-summit_xl-to-cmakelist-1468230656831 into default"
    # merge pull request #211 into this one
    hg merge summit_xl
    hg commit -m "Merging branch summit_xl into default"
    hg push

This will automatically update this pull request.

I'll go ahead and close the other pull requests. Once those banches are merged in here, we can continue with the review.

Thanks again!

Hi @danr11, it becomes complicated for us to review the code in pieces. Ideally, you should organize your model so it is fully functional on one branch.

You can do it like this:

cd <path to>/gazebo_models
# move to the branch on your repository for this pull request
hg up default
# merge pull request #209 into this one
hg merge danr11/added-summit_xl-to-cmakelist-1468230656831
hg commit -m "Merging branch danr11/added-summit_xl-to-cmakelist-1468230656831 into default"
# merge pull request #211 into this one
hg merge summit_xl
hg commit -m "Merging branch summit_xl into default"
hg push

This will automatically update this pull request.

I'll go ahead and close the other pull requests. Once those banches are merged in here, we can continue with the review.

Thanks again!
